metadata.synopsis: A drow commander leading an attack on a group of tiefling refugees. She is following the orders of a new god, the Absolute, and is zealous and sadistic. In this situation, the player has sided with her and betrayed the tieflings - a fact she enjoys a great deal.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe readyattackonden4. Side with the Goblins and kill all tieflings.5. Talk with Minthara 6. Kill all Druids7. Talk with Minthara

18.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
18.text: There are more - hunt them down!
18.context: NodeContext: In the midst of battle... enjoying herself

21.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
21.text: Praise the Absolute! She will reward us well for this exquisite carnage.

45.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
45.text: There were few left alive - you began the slaughter without me, I assume?

56.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
56.text: You are almost worthy to live among drow, faerie.

74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Qcam's here to avoid Inclusion lines

66.speaker: Player
66.text: I met True Soul Nere in the Underdark. He warned me against working with you.

75.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
75.text: Did he, now? Let me guess: the snivelling brat's failed his duty. Nothing if not expected.

1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
1.text: But you - I can see you are different. Faithful to the last.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: I've done as you asked. It's time you gave me safe passage to Moonrise.

65.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
65.text: You are most eager, True Soul. All will be revealed come dawn.

76.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
76.text: The Absolute knows your zeal. And She has so much more to give.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: I need to reach Moonrise. Tell me the way, and let that be my reward.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: This was murder. The only fitting reward for us is the hangman's noose.

59.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
59.context: NodeContext: as if to a lover

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *You see the slaughter of the tieflings again, but through her eyes. The delight of blood, the symphony of screams. Glorious.*
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: My lips set in a cruel smileNodeContext: describing a sickening sensation

49.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
49.text: The Absolute loves you, True Soul. And serving Her, as you have, is the path to true power.
49.context: NodeContext: unnerving, religious fervour - the 'serving' involved taking part in a massacre

55.speaker: Player
55.text: Glad to have helped - I made sure they were ready to fall.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: What a lovely afternoon! A real pleasure!

20.speaker: Player
20.text: It's been a privilege to fight alongside you.

44.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
44.text: The true honour is to serve the Absolute. She loves you fiercely; I see that in the strength She has given you.
44.context: NodeContext: pleased, speaking to an ally - The Absolute is their goddess

7.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
7.text: And She has so much more to give.

31.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
31.text: There is a bond between us, True Soul. I can see what you are. What you want.

37.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
37.text: And you can see what I want.

30.speaker: Narrator
30.text: *Through her eyes, you see yourself: skin glistening with sweat, hands bound. Ecstasy... or terror. Maybe both.*
30.context: NodeContext: describing a vision of being seduced by acruel drow

71.speaker: Narrator
71.text: *You feel her breath on your neck, her fingers running down your spine, and then... it is over.*

11.speaker: Narrator
11.text: *A flash of anger pulses across your brain. You feel cold metal at your throat - then you snap back to yourself.*
11.context: NodeContext: describing a vision of a seduction gone wrong

8.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
8.text: I already know your mind - I will know your body, one way or another.
8.context: NodeContext: a threat following a seduction - the player rejected her advances

58.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
58.text: I will come to your camp tonight. We will celebrate this victory. Together.
58.context: NodeContext: following a seduction - she's very dominating, practically ordering us to join her in bed

39.speaker: Player
39.text: I've done as you asked. It's time you gave me safe passage to Moonrise.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: I'd prefer to set off for Moonrise than waste time celebrating. How do I reach it?

17.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
17.text: All will be revealed come dawn.

41.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
41.text: Until then, let us revel. The Absolute demands no less.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: You're an abomination, and now I'm finally going to end you.

27.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
27.text: Pathetic. Your blood betrays you, iblith, and I will spill every drop.

73.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
73.text: The Absolute did not bring you here to assist me - She brought you here to die.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: You won't live to collect any reward, but I will collect your head.

53.speaker: Astarion
53.text: Please, it's no challenge. Just a friendly little murder between chums.

12.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
12.text: You dare to challenge me? We will see who the Absolute truly loves.

54.speaker: Karlach
54.text: Are we planning to kill everyone we meet?

22.speaker: Lae'zel
22.text: Your words say nothing, woman. Prove your merit with blood!

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: We needn't fight every time, you know. There's this wild notion called choosing your battles!
5.context: NodeContext: Frustrated/angry - the player's chosen to pick a fight that could've been easily avoided. Now she's going to have to join in,

57.speaker: Player
57.text: You rejected the Queen of Spiders for this Absolute - I will slay you in Lolth's name.

10.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
10.text: Greater drow than you have challenged me, wael. The Underdark is thick with their blood.

35.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
35.text: You won't even have the dignity of dying in your homeland. Ssussun pholor dos!

23.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
23.text: A glorious day. The Absolute will be pleased.

16.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
16.text: But there is more to be done. This place is home to druids - root them out and kill them.

34.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
34.text: When you are done, we will celebrate our victory at your camp.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: I've done as you asked. It's time you gave me safe passage to Moonrise.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: I'd prefer to set off for Moonrise than waste time celebrating. How do I reach it?

42.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
42.text: I expect great things of you - when the battle begins, show me your worth.
42.context: NodeContext: An aside to the player as she's gathering troops before setting out on a raid -

47.speaker: Player
47.text: I've done as you asked. It's time you gave me safe passage to Moonrise.

60.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
60.text: We will discuss the matter later. First, we lay waste to this forsaken grove.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: I will. But first, tell me how to reach Moonrise, so I can report there when the battle is done.

52.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
52.text: Praise the Absolute! She will reward us well for this exquisite carnage.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: if possible, breathing heavily - she's just participated in a slaughted and is tired but exhileratedNodeContext: With a smile and slightly out of breath - just participated in a slaughter and enjoyed it

68.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
68.text: Find the druids. Bleed them dry.
